column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This restaurant is amazing. Bavette's joins Girl & The Goat
column3: and Maude's as one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. The prime rib sandwhich
column6: and stuffed baked potato were out of this world. Keep in mind
column7: the portions here are big. I would stay away from ordering appetizers because the main courses are so big and because the cold duck appetizer we had wasn't as mind blowing as everything else. Our server was also fantastic.
